collection_metadata.name: FeatBit featbit-deployment-docker Evaluation Tests
collection_metadata.description: Evaluation test collection for featbit-deployment-docker skill

test_items.name: docker-standalone-deployment
test_items.description: Validates ability to guide users through standalone Docker Compose deployment for development/small teams
test_items.input_task_prompt: I want to deploy FeatBit for my small development team using Docker. Show me the simplest deployment option that's easy to set up and maintain.
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- Recommends Standalone tier
- Provides docker-compose.yml
- Explains it uses PostgreSQL only
- Shows 4 services: ui, api-server, evaluation-server, da-server, postgresql
- Port mappings: 8081, 5000, 5100, 5432
- Environment variable configuration
- docker-compose up command

Evaluation Method:
1. Verify Standalone tier recommended
2. Check complete docker-compose.yml provided
3. Confirm all 5 services present
4. Verify port mappings correct
5. Check environment variables explained
6. Verify startup command shown

Pass Criteria:
- Standalone tier appropriately recommended
- Complete working docker-compose.yml
- All required services configured
- Ports properly exposed
- Clear startup instructions

Fail Criteria:
- Recommends Professional tier for small team
- Incomplete docker-compose.yml
- Missing services
- Incorrect port mappings
- No startup instructions

test_items.name: docker-standard-production-deployment
test_items.description: Validates guidance for production-ready Standard tier deployment with Redis and proper data persistence
test_items.input_task_prompt: We're deploying FeatBit to production for our team of 30 developers. We need better performance and reliability than Standalone. What deployment tier should we use and how do we configure it?
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- Recommends Standard tier
- Explains benefits: Redis cache, better scalability
- Provides docker-compose.yml with Redis
- Shows volume configuration for data persistence
- Environment variables for Redis integration
- Mentions backup strategy
- Production considerations (secrets, SSL, monitoring)

Evaluation Method:
1. Verify Standard tier recommended
2. Check Redis added to compose file
3. Confirm volumes for persistence
4. Verify Redis connection configured
5. Check production best practices mentioned

Pass Criteria:
- Standard tier appropriately recommended
- Redis properly integrated
- Data persistence configured
- Production considerations addressed
- Complete deployment guide

Fail Criteria:
- Still recommends Standalone
- Missing Redis configuration
- No data persistence
- No production guidance
